description:
The following file uses the deprecated md5 library(http://docs.python.org/library/md5.html)

nova/plugins/xenserver/xenapi/etc/xapi.d/plugins/glance


Solution: Use hashlib
title: Use of Deprecated md5 library

comments.content:
The following file uses the deprecated md5 library(http://docs.python.org/library/md5.html)

nova/plugins/xenserver/xenapi/etc/xapi.d/plugins/glance


Solution: Use hashlib

comments.content: XenServer [lugins need to run on Python 2.4, which has no hashlib. Using md5 module is still necessary.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johannes.erdfelt
